Name: Thornwood Ranger
Story Background: Thornwood Rangers are skilled trackers who specialize in navigating the dense and perilous Thornwood forest.
Ability: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Appearance Description: The Thornwood Ranger is a rugged and capable warrior, clad in earth-toned leathers and armed with a keen bow. They are often accompanied by a loyal wolf companion, which aids them in their hunting and scouting expeditions.
